My full review:
Pros:
A long *** grind, especially after 6.1. Points tho cause it's 'mostly' fun. 
Definitely good variety and uniqueness with characters.
Leveling system is better than average due to it being a random tree branch sys.
Skill required
Frequent sales
Yui Kimura and obv Joe Keery's voice acting

Cons:
The maps could be much better. 
The currency system is ridiculously low rewarding and with a very limiting cap. You'd have to play weeks of actual game time to be anything other than a novice.
Devs try to balance the game, but don't seem to listen or provide options. I've lost a lot of interest with the recent changes.
SoloQ can be a nightmare, play with friends!
Match-Making is probably the worst here than in any game I've ever played oof..
Arguably one of the most toxic communities I've witnessed. Sure, there's worse.. sadly.
Needs a commendation system instead of a report system they don't monitor.
Cosmetic options are created by ms paint. RIP Adam Francis.

TL;DR: 6.5/10 but the idea is fantastic. Wait for sale.
